modelIdentification.name: SISO Space Reference FOM Augmented Management
modelIdentification.purpose: Defines the augmented set of Execution Configuration Object (ExCO) parameters.
modelIdentification.description: Contains the augmented set of Execution Configuration Object (ExCO) parameters.

poc.pocOrg: NASA Johnson Space Center, Houston, TX

objectClass.name: ExecutionConfiguration2
objectClass.semantics: This is the augmented federation Execution Configuration Object (ExCO). This object defines the augmented set of attributes necessary to coordinate federation and federate execution time lines and execution mode transitions in a SISO Space Reference FOM compliant federation execution.

attribute.name: hla_base_time_multiplier
attribute.semantics: The HLA base time multiplier for the HLA 64-bit integer time used for the Lookahead and Timestamp values.
